ForceAbility.Name: Battle Meditation Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
[P]The Force user directs allies in battle, making them more effective as a coordinated unit.
[P]The use may spend [FP] to add one automatic [SU] to all checks made by a number of engaged friendly targets to up his Presence before the end of his next turn. If the user used any [DA] to generate [FP], reduce each target's Willpower by 1 (to a minimum of 1) until the end of the encounter.

ForceAbility.Name: Sense Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
[P]The Force user can sense the Force interacting with the world around him.
[P]The user may spend [FP] to sense all living things within short range (including sentient and non-sentient beings).
[P]The user may spend [FP] to sense the current emotional state of one living target with whom he is engaged.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Upgrade Difficulty
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing Effect: Commit [FO]. Once per round, when an attack targets the Force user, he upgrades the difficulty of the pool once.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Sense's ongoing effect may be triggered one additional time per round.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: When using Sense's ongoing effects, upgrade the pool twice, instead of once.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Upgrade Ability
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing Effect: Commit [FO]. Once per round, when the Force user makes a combat check, he upgrades the ability of that check once.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Sense Thoughts
ForceAbility.Description: Effect: Spend [FP]. The Force user senses the current thoughts of one living target with whom he is engaged.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase number of targets affected by power equal to magnitude upgrades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Orders
ForceAbility.Description: When making a [B]Battle Meditation power check[b], the user may make an [B]Easy ([DI]) Leadership check[b] as part of the pool. If the user is able to activate the power and succeeds on the check, he may send simple orders as part of his power.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Planetary Scale
ForceAbility.Description: May suffer 4 strain to change the range of the power and range upgrades to planetary scale.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO][FO][FO] to sustain the ongoing effects of the power on each affected target while it remains in range.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to affect a number of additional targets equal to Presence per rank of Magnitude purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: If no [DA] were used to generate [FP], choose one skill. While affected by the power, each affected character counts as having the same number of ranks in the chosen skill as the affected character with the most ranks in the skill. If the user used any [DA] to generate [FP], each affected character must make an [B]Easy (DI) Discipline check[b] if he wishes to resist obeying orders.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to add one additional automatic [SU] to affected characters' checks.

ForceAbility.Name: Bind Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: [P]The Force user restrains an enemy, preventing the target from acting. [P]The user may spend [FP] to immobilize a target within short range until the end of the user's next turn. If the user used any [DA] to generate [FP], the target also suffers 1 wound per [FP] spend on the check (ignoring soak).

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Strain
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [DP], whenever a target affected by Bind takes an action, that target suffers strain equal to Willpower.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Move
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to move the target one range band closer or farther away.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO][FO][FO] to sustain the ongoing effects of the power on each affected target.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to affect 1 additional target within range per rank of Magnitude purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: When the user is making a [B]Bind power check[b], if the check was not already opposed, the user may roll an opposed [B]Discipline vs. Discipline check[b] against one target of the power. If no [DA] were used to generate [FP] and the user succeeds on the check, he may immediately stagger the target until the end of his next turn. If any [DA] were used to generate [FP] and the check succeeds, the target suffers a Critical Injury, adding +10 to the roll per [FP] spent on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to disorient the target for a number of rounds equal to Strength upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Enhance Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
When making an Athletics check, the Force user may roll an [B] Enhance power check[b] as part of the pool.
[P]The user may spend [FP] to gain [SU] or [AD] (user's choice) on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Force Leap (Maneuver)
ForceAbility.Description: The user can perform Force Leap as a maneuver instead of an action.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Coordination
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Coordination skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Resilience
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Resilience skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Force Leap (Horizontal)
ForceAbility.Description: Take a Force Leap action: Make an [B]Enhanced power check[b]. The user may spend [FP] to jump horizontally to any location in short range.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Piloting - Planetary
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Piloting (Planetary) skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Brawl
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Brawl skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Force Leap (Vertical)
ForceAbility.Description: When performing a Force Leap, the user can jump vertically in addition to jumping horizontally.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Piloting - Space
ForceAbility.Description: Enhance can be used with the Piloting (Space) skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Brawn
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing Effect: Commit [FO]. The user increases his Brawn characteristic by 1 (to maximum of 6).

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Agility
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing Effect: Commit [FO]. The user increases his Agility characteristic by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Foresee Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The Force user can feel the Force flowing around everything, seeing what is and what will be.
[P] The user may spend [FP] to gain vague hints of events to come, up to a day into his own, personal future.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Initiative (Success)
ForceAbility.Description: When making a skill check to determine Initiative, the user may roll a [B] Foresee power check[b] as part of the pool. He may spend [FP] to gain [SU] on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Defense
ForceAbility.Description: Affected targets increase their ranged and melee defense by 2 for the first round of combat.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Initiative (Maneuver)
ForceAbility.Description: When performing a [B]Foresee power check[b] as part of an Initiative check, the user may spend [FP] to allow all affected targets to take one free maneuver before the first round of combat begins.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase the days into the future the user can see equal to Duration upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase targets affected equal to Magnitude upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to pick out specific details equal to Strength upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Heal/Harm Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The Force user bolsters his ally with renewed vigor or saps his foe of vital energy.
[P][B]Heal (light side Force user only)[b]: Spend [FP] to heal a number of wounds equal to Intellect from an engaged living creature (including user).
[P][B]Harm[b]: Spend [FP] to inflict a number of wounds equal to Intellect (ignoring soak) on an engaged living target. The user gains 1 Conflict.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Medicine
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Heal[b]: Heal additional wounds equal to ranks in Medicine.
[P][B]Harm[b]: Inflict additional wounds equal to ranks in Medicine.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Strain
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Heal[b]: If no [DA] generated [FP], target heals strain equal to wounds healed.
[P][B]Harm[b]: If any [DA] were used to generated [FP], user heals strain equal to wounds inflicted.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Status
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Heal[b]: Spend [FP] to remove one status effect from target.
[P][B]Harm[b]: The user may spend [FP] to heal wounds equal to wounds inflicted on target. Healed character gains 1 Conflict.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Critical
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Heal[b]: May make a [B]Heal power check[b] combined with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Medicine check[b]. If the check succeeds, one target who heals wounds also heal one Critical Injury.
[P][B]Harm[b]: May make a [B]Harm power check[b] combined with a [B]opposed Medicine vs. Resilience check[b]. If check succeeds, one target who suffers wounds also suffers one Critical Injury (adding +10 to the roll per [AD][AD]).

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to affect 1 additional target within range per rank of Magnitude purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Heal[b]: Once per session, spend [FP][FP][FP][FP] to restore 1 target who died after the end of user's last turn to life.
[P][B]Harm[b]: Once per session, when this power kills a target, may restore one engaged character who died this encounter to life. Each character gains 7 Conflict.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Heal[b]: Spend [FP] to increase wounds healed by 1 per rank of Strength upgrades purchased.
[P][B]Harm[b]: Spend [FP] to increase wounds inflicted by 1 per rank of Strength upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Influence Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The character may attempt to guide, shape, and even twist the thoughts and feelings of other.
[P][B]Special Rule ([LI]/[DA] use)[b]: When guiding and shaping thoughts, only [FP] generated from [DA] may be used to generate negative emotions such as rage, fear, and hatred. Only [FP] generated from[LI] may be used to generate positive emotions such as peace, tranquility, and friendliness. Other emotions such as confusion can be created from [FP] generated from either [LI] or [DA].
[P]The character may spend [FP] to stress the mind of one living target he is engaged with, inflicting 1 strain.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Emotion/Belief
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user may make an [B]opposed Discipline vs. Discipline check[b] combined with an [B]Influence power check[b]. If the user spends [FP] and succeeds on the check, he can force the target to adopt an emotional state or believe something untrue, lasting for 1 round or 5 minutes.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Skills
ForceAbility.Description: When making a Coercion, Charm, Deception, Leadership, or Negotiation check, the Force user may roll an [B]Influence power check[b] as part of his dice pool. He may spend [FP] to gain [SU] or [AD] (user's choice) on the check.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase duration by number of rounds (or minutes) equal to Duration upgrades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase targets affected equal to Magnitude upgrades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: When stressing the mind of a target, the character inflicts 2 strain.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ForceAbility.Name: Misdirect Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The Force user creates illusions to fool those around him.
[P]The user may spend [FP] to make a target at up to short range unable to perceive a chosen person or object of silhouette 1 or smaller. Until the beginning of the user's next turn, the target cannot see or sense the hidden person or object.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Appearance
ForceAbility.Description: The user may alter the perceived appearance of the chosen person or object instead of hiding it.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Illusion
ForceAbility.Description: May use this power to force the target to perceive a single illusory person of object.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Combat
ForceAbility.Description: Commit one or more [FO]. Add [TH] per [FO] to all combat checks targeting Force user.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO][FO] to sustain this power while the beguiled target remains in range.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to affect additional targets equal to Presence per rank of Magnitude purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to obscure additional objects or create illusions equal to Cunning plus Deception.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to increase the silhouette of the object obscured or illusion created by 1 per Strength upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Move Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The Force user can move small objects via the power of the Force.
[P]The user may spend [FP] to move one object of silhouette 0 that is within short range up to his maximum range. The default maximum range is short range.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Hurl
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user can hurl objects to damage targets by making a [B]ranged combat check[b] combined with a [B]Move power check[b], dealing damage equal to 10 times silhouette.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Pull
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user can pull objects out of secure mountings or out of an opponent's grasp.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Manipulate
ForceAbility.Description: The character can perform fine manipulation of items, allowing him to do whatever he could normally do with his hands via this power at this power's range.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase targets affected equal to Magnitude upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase silhouette able to be targeted equal to Strength upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Protect/Unleash Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The Force user guides the flow of energy, protecting himself and others or unleashing blasts of power upon his foes.
[P][B]Protect[b]: The user makes a [B]Protect power check[b] and rolls an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Discipline check[b] as part of the pool. Spend [FP][FP] to reduce damage from an energy-based weapon that hits himself or an engaged character by amount equal to Willpower plus 1 per [SU]. Dark Side Force users may only protect themselves.
[P][B]Unleash[b]: The user makes an [B]Unleash power check[b] as ranged attack and rolls an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Discipline check[b] for difficulty. If check succeeds and spend [FP][FP], the attack hits. It has a range of short, a base damage equal to Willpower, and a critical rating of 4. The user gains 1 Conflict.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Defense/Strain
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Protect[b]: Spend [AD] to gain defense equal to [AD] spent.
[P][B]Unleash[b]: Spend [AD] to inflict 1 strain on target.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: All Attacks/Ensnare
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Protect[b]: Spend [FP] to allow power to protect against all types of attack.
[P][B]Unleash[b]: Spend [FP] to give the attack Ensnare 2.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Incidental/Maneuver
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Protect[b]: Light side Force users may spend 1 Destiny Point to use Protect as an out-of-turn incidental once per session.
[P][B]Unleash[b]: Dark side Force users may spend 1 Destiny Point to use Unleash as a maneuver once per session.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Protect[b]: If no [DA] generated [FP] the power reduces damage of all attacks hitting the target.
[P][B]Unleash[b]: Spend [FP] to give the attack Burn 2.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to affect 1 additional target within range per rank of Magnitude purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Protect[b]: Light side Force users may spend [FP][FP] to reflect attacks they reduce to 0 damage, dealing damage equal to initial attack to attacker.
[P][B]Unleash[b]: Dark side Force users may spend [FP] to reduce critical rating of attacks to 1.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to decrease damage or add damage equal to ranks of Strength purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Seek Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description:
The Force user allows the will of the Force to lead the way to something lost or forgotten.
[P]The user may spend [FP][FP] to gain insight into the general location or direction of a person or object that he knows about, regardless of current distance.
[P]The user may spend [FP] and succeed at an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Vigilance check[b] (or [B]opposed Vigilance vs. Discipline check[b]) to see through illusions.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Skills
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [FO]. Upgrade the ability of Vigilance and Perception checks once.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Target
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to track one additional target.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Pierce
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [FO][FO][FO]. The user's attacks gain Pierce with rating equal to Cunning plus ranks in Perception.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO] to continue tracking target even when it moves.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to gain one additional detail per Magnitude upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: Make [B]Seek power check[b] and spend [FP][FP][FP] to add [TR] to combat checks against one target for remainder of encounter.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to gain one additional detail per Magnitude upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Warde's Foresight Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: [P]The Force user can feel the Force flowing around another specific individual to gain insight into what that person might do. The user may spend [FP] to gain hints about what another individual within short range is likely to do in the near future.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Spend [FP][FP] to have the bonuses the power grants apply to all checks for rounds equal to Duration upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Spend [FP][FP]to add [BO] equal to Strength upgrades purchased to user's next check against the target.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: [P]When performing a Warde’s Foresight power check as part of an Initiative check, spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] to ally's first check this encounter.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Maneuver
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Once per encounter, use the basic power as a maneuver.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Initiative
ForceAbility.Description: [P]When performing a Warde’s Foresight power check as part of an Initiative check, spend [FP] to add [AD] on user’s first check this encounter.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Successes
ForceAbility.Description: [P]When performing a Warde’s Foresight power check as part of an Initiative check, if the user did not use [DA] to generate [FP] each ally adds automatic [DA] to the results of his Initiative check. If the user used % to generate [FP] the user may immediately perform an action before the encounter begins, but each enemy in the encounter adds automatic [SU] to the results of his Initiative check.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Ally Initiative
ForceAbility.Description: [P]When performing a Warde’s Foresight power check as part of an Initiative check, if the user did not use [DA] to generate [FP] each ally adds automatic [SU] to the results of his Initiative check. If the user used [DA] to generate [FP] the user may immediately perform an action before the encounter begins, but each enemy in the encounter adds automatic [SU] to the results of his Initiative check.

ForceAbility.Name: Suppress Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: [P]The Force user can dampen the effect of incoming force powers, dramatically diminishing their effects on himself and his allies. [P]The user may spend [FP] to add automatic [FA] to force power checks made against him or any ally within short range until the end of his next turn.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Spend [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Strain
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Whenever a Force user targets a character affected by Suppress with a hostile Force power, if that opponent used [DA] to generate [FP] on the check, he suffers strain equal to the user's ranks in Discipline.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: [P]The user may make a Suppress power check along with an opposed Discipline vs. Discipline check targeting another Force user within short range. If the user spends [FP][FP] and succeeds on the check, the target Force user immediately uncommits all [FO] and ends all ongoing effects of Force powers and Force talents that required committed [FO].

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Commit
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Commit one or more [FO]. When an opponent targets the user with a Force power, after the opponent generates [FP], reduce the total [FP] generated by 1 per [FO] committed, to a minimum of 0.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Destiny
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Spend 1 Destiny Point to use Suppress as an out of turn incidental once per session.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Spend [FP] to add additional [FA] equal to Strength upgrades purchased to hostile Force power checks.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: [P]Ongoing effect: Commit [FO] to sustain ongoing effects of the power on each affected target within range.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Transparent
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to see through a single object at medium range as though it were transparent.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP]. The user now can see as though from a spot within close range (planetary scale) of the user's body.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Vigilance
ForceAbility.Description: When making a Vigilance or Perception check, make a Farsight power check as part of the pool and spend [FP] to gain [SU] or [AD] on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase duration by number of rounds for minutes equal to Duration upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Mechanics
ForceAbility.Description: When making a Mechanics skill check, the user may roll a Manipulate power check as part of the pool and may spend [FP] to gain [SU] or [AD] (user's choice) on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase the power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: When performing Manipulate power check as part of a Mechanics skill check, the user may spend [FP][FP] to gain [TR] on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Inflict Strain
ForceAbility.Description: When performing a combat check against a droid, ship, vehicle or other mechanical construct within engaged ranged, the user may spend [FP] to inflict 1 additional strain or system strain on the target.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: When using this power spend [FP] to cause targets to recover 1 additional strain or system strain or heal 1 additional wound for every Strength upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Heal Droid
ForceAbility.Description: The user may spend [FP] to heal a number of wounds equal to his Intellect in an engaged droid.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Item Damage
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [FO] One damaged weapon or item counts as being undamaged.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Increase System Strain
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [FO] Increase the system strain threshold of 1 vehicle or starship at engaged range by 3 per [FO] committed.

ForceAbility.Name: Manipulate Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user shapes machine components on a molecular level, allowing him to mend damaged mechanical systems. [BR]The Force user may spend [FP] to cause one vehicle or starship he is engaged with to recover one system strain. The user may activate this multiple times.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Upgrade Computers and Mechanics
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [FO]. Upgrade the ability of Computers and Mechanics check once.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Increase Hull Trauma
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect: Commit [FO]. Increase the hull trauma threshold of 1 vehicle or starship at engaged range by 3 per [FO] committed.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Fine Details
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to make out fine details on a single object within medium range.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Perception
ForceAbility.Description: This power gains the ongoing effect: Commit [FO] after successfully activating the Farsight power to increase ranks in Perception by 1.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Panoramic Vision
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to see in every direction simultaneously, noticing and observing things in a full 360 degree arc.

ForceAbility.Name: Farsight Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user expands normal visual senses through a connection to the Force. [BR]The user may spend [FP] to ignore the effects of darkness or blindness and see normally at up to medium range for the remainder of the round (or for one minute). This allows the user to view everything mst sentients could normally be able to see on a well lit day.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Microscopic Details
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to see microscopic details of a single object within engaged range.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase power's range by one range band equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Imbue Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user lends strength to allies, making them more potent, resourceful, or resilient for a time. [P]The user may spend [FP] [FP] to increase one of another engaged character's characteristics by 1 (to a maximum of 6) until the end of the Force user's next turn. [P]This can only be used once per character per encounter. If the user uses [DA] to generate [FP], the target increases a second characteristic by 1 (to a maximum of 6) until the end of the user's next turn, but both the Force user and target suffer 3 strain.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: If no [DA] were used to generate [FP], decrease all Critical Injuries suffered and inflicted by the target by 10 per Strength upgrade purchased. If no [LI] were used to generate [FP], increase all Critical Injuries suffered and inflicted by 10 per Strength upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Skill Ranks
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to allow the target to count as having ranks in a skill equal to user's ranks in the skill.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: Increase characteristics boosted by this power by 2 (to a maximum of 7) instead of 1 (to a maximum of 6).

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] [FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO] [FO] to sustain the effects of this power as long as the target remains in range.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO] to sustain the effects of this power as long as the target remains in range.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to exclude number of targets equal to Magnitude upgrades purchased from being affected.

ForceAbility.Name: Ebb/Flow Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user's action empower himself or sap strength from his foes. [P][B]Ebb:[b] When the Force user makes a skill check, he may roll an [B]Ebb power check[b] as part of the roll. The user may spend [FP] to suffer 1 strain, then inflict 1 strain on all other engaged characters. The Force user may not activate this multiple times. [P][B]Flow:[b] When the Force user makes a skill check, he may roll an [B]Flow power check[b] as part of the roll. The user may spend [FP] to heal 1 strain, then inflict 1 strain on all other engaged characters. The Force user may not activate this multiple times.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] [FP] to affect all other characters at short range.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength: Strain
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user may spend [FP] to increase the strain healed or inflicted by 1.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength: Failure/Success
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user may spend [FP] to increase the [FA] or [SU] added by 1.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength: Threat/Advantage
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user may spend [FP] to increase the [TH] or [AD] added by 1.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Threat/Advantage
ForceAbility.Description: [B]Ebb:[b] When making a [B]combined Ebb power check[b], may spend [FP] to add [TH] to any checks made by engaged opponents until the end of next turn. [P][B]Flow:[b] When making a [B]combined Flow power check[b], may spend [FP] to add [AD] to any checks using the same skill until the end of next turn.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Question
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] [FP] [FP] once per encounter to ask the GM a single "yes or no" question.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Failure/Success
ForceAbility.Description: [B]Ebb:[b] When making a [B]combined Ebb power check[b], may spend [FP] to add [FA] to any checks made by engaged opponents until the end of next turn. [P][B]Flow:[b] When making a [B]combined Flow power check[b], may spend [FP] to add [SU] to any checks using the same skill until the end of next turn.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Skill Checks
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO] until the end of the current encounter. For the remainder of the current encounter, add [FO] to all skill checks. Each [LI] and [DA] adds either [SU] or [AD] to the check; each [DA] causes the user to suffer 1 strain and gain 1 Conflict.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description:
[B]Ebb:[b] Once per session, if a target suffered at least 5 strain from this power, add [DE] to the target's next check.
[P][B]Flow:[b] Once per session, if the user healed at least 5 strain from this power, add [TR] to user's next check.

ForceAbility.Name: Jerserra's Influence Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force use can project terrifying visions onto foes, forcing them to face their greatest fears. [P]The user may spend [FP] to target one character within short range. That character must immediately make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) fear check[b] as an out of turn incidental.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase the power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Strain
ForceAbility.Description: If target suffers strain as a result of Jerserra's Influence, the Force user recovers an equal amount of strain.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Fear
ForceAbility.Description: When making a fear check, the Force user can roll a [B]Jerserra's Influence power check[b] as part of the pool. The user may spend [FP] to gain [SU] or [AD] (user's choice) on the check.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase the number of targets affected by a number equal to Magnitude upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user may spend [FP] to increase the difficulty of the fear check by a number of times equal to Strength upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Willpower
ForceAbility.Description: Ongoing effect. Commit [FO]. The user increases his Willpower characteristic by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user may target one character within short range and make an [B]opposed Discipline vs. Discipline check[b] combined with a [B]Jerserra's Influence power check[b]. If the user spends [FP] and succeeds on the check, he may commit [FO] and force the target to also commit [FO]. Both dice remain committed until the Force user uncommits that [FO] or the encounter ends.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: Once per session, after a target fails a fear check caused by this power, the Force user may have the target perform one action as an out of turn incidental. The Force user gains 3 Conflict.

ForceAbility.Name: Conjure Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user calls forth a spectral object to their hand, which lasts for a short time. [P]The user may spend [FP] to create a facsimile of a Brawl or Melee weapon anywhere within engaged range. At the end of the user's next turn, this item dissipates. At the GM's discretion, the user can instead conjure a simple tool and other useful low-tech item with an encumbrance no greater than 1.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO] to sustain 1 conjuration per Duration upgrade purchased while it remains at medium range.

ForceAbility.Name: Number
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to create additional, identical conjurations equal to ranks in Number upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase the maximum encumbrance of the facsimile that can be conjured by 2 per Magnitude upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Defensive, Deflection, Stun
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to add 1 of the following weapon qualities to the conjuration: Defensive 1, Deflection 1, Stun 4.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Burn, Pierce, Vicious
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to add 1 of the following weapon qualities to the conjuration: Burn 3, Pierce 3, Vicious 3.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP][FP] to summon the facsimile of a creature of silhouette 1 or smaller instead of an object. This creature is bound to the user's will, and mindlessly follows that character's commands until the end of the Force user's next turn. If the user has the corpse of the creature being conjured to imbue with false life, this facsimile lasts until the end of the encounter instead, but the user gains 7 conflict for doing so.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to increase the range at which the facsimile can be conjured and sustained by 1 (to a maximum of extreme).

ForceAbility.Name: Alter Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user can tap into the Living Force of their surroundings, manipulating the nearby environs. [P]The Force user may spend [FP] to make all terrain currently within short range difficult terrain until the end of their next turn. [P]The Force user may spend [FP] to make all terrain currently within short range normal terrain until the end of their next turn.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Supplies
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] and make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Survival check[b] to instantly discover food, water, or other critical supplies within extreme range.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to increase power's range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Concealment
ForceAbility.Description: The Force user may spend [FP] to give all characters within short range of the user concealment.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Animals
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to share the senses of animals within range of this power, adding [BO] to Perception and Vigilance checks, and gaining other benefits.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Firm Terrain
ForceAbility.Description: The power can affect firm terrain, such as packed earth, stone, or ice.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: Commit [FO] after successfully activating the power to sustain its effects while the user remains within range of the affected area.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP] to allow a number of targets equal to the number of Strength upgrades to ignore this power's effects.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Impassible
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to make a small patch of terrain within the affected area impassible.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Corrosive
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to create a corrosive atmosphere in a small area within the effected area.

ForceAbility.Name: Control: Upgrade
ForceAbility.Description: Spend [FP][FP] to upgrade to difficulty of all checks made by opponents while in the power's area of effect once.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: When the user activates this power without spending [FP] generated from [DA] results, add [LI] to all other Force power checks made within this power's area of effect. [P]When the user activates this power without spending [FP] generated from [LI] results, add [DA] to all other Force power checks made within this power's area of effect.

ForceAbility.Name: Endure Basic Power
ForceAbility.Description: When the character suffers a Critical Injury with a severity rating no greater than [B]Easy ([DI])[b], the character may activate Endure as an out-of-turn incidental and commit [FO] to temporarily ignore the effects of that injury. The character does not apply results from the Critical Injury or add +10 to further rolls on the Critical Injury Result table while [FO] remains committed. When this ongoing effect ends, the character suffers all effects of the Critical Injury (unless it has been treated).

ForceAbility.Name: Strength
ForceAbility.Description: Increase the severity of Critical Injury that can be affected by one per Strength upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Control
ForceAbility.Description: The character can commit one additional [FO] to temporarily ignore one additional Critical Injury per Control upgrade purchased.

ForceAbility.Name: Duration
ForceAbility.Description: As an incidental, the character can activate Endure to temporarily ignore a Critical Injury the character is already suffering, and which is of a severity that Endure could affect normally.

ForceAbility.Name: Magnitude
ForceAbility.Description: The character can use Endure to affect allies at short range. The ongoing effect ends if the distance between the characters increases beyond short for any reason.

ForceAbility.Name: Range
ForceAbility.Description: The character can use Endure to affect allies within medium range. The ongoing effect ends if the distance between the characters increases beyond medium for any reason.

ForceAbility.Name: Mastery
ForceAbility.Description: When activating Endure, the character may make an Endure power check, making a Discipline check with a difficulty equal to the severity of the Critical Injury and adding [FO] up to the character's Force rating. If the character succeeds on the check and generates [FP] equal to the Severity of the Critical Injury, the Critical Injury is not suffered.

ForceAbility.Name: Strength: Dead
ForceAbility.Description: The character can use Endure to temporarily ignore a Critical Injury result of Dead.
